017
018package com.github.tommyettinger.tantrum.jdkgdxds;
019
020import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.EnumLongOrderedMap;
021import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.OrderType;
022import com.github.tommyettinger.tantrum.digital.helpers.Support;
023import org.apache.fory.Fory;
024import org.apache.fory.memory.MemoryBuffer;
025import org.apache.fory.memory.Platform;
026import org.apache.fory.serializer.Serializer;
027
028/**
029 * Fory {@link Serializer} for jdkgdxds {@link EnumLongOrderedMap}s.
030 */
031public class EnumLongOrderedMapSerializer extends Serializer<EnumLongOrderedMap> {
032
033    public EnumLongOrderedMapSerializer(Fory fory) {
034        super(fory, EnumLongOrderedMap.class);
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public void write(final MemoryBuffer output, final EnumLongOrderedMap data) {
039        output.writePrimitiveArrayWithSize(data.values().toArray(), Platform.LONG_ARRAY_OFFSET, data.size() << 3);
040        for(Enum<?> v : data.keySet()){
041            fory.writeRef(output, v);
042        }
043        fory.writeJavaString(output, data.getOrderType().name());
044        output.writeInt64(data.getDefaultValue());
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public EnumLongOrderedMap read(MemoryBuffer input) {
049        long[] vs = Support.readLongsAndSize(input);
050        final int len = vs.length;
051        Enum<?>[] ks = new Enum<?>[len];
052        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
053            ks[i] = (Enum<?>)fory.readRef(input);
054        }
055
056        EnumLongOrderedMap data = new EnumLongOrderedMap(ks, vs, OrderType.valueOf(fory.readJavaString(input)));
057        data.setDefaultValue(input.readInt64());
058        return data;
059
060    }
061}
